  • 所有已实现的接口:
    JsonFormatVisitable, SchemaAware, ContextualSerializer, Serializable
    封闭类:
    NumberSerializers

    public static final class NumberSerializers.IntegerSerializer
extends NumberSerializers.Base<Object>
    This is the special serializer for regular Integers (and primitive ints)

    Since this is one of "native" types, no type information is ever included on serialization (unlike for most scalar types)

    NOTE: as of 2.6, generic signature changed to Object, to avoid generation of bridge methods.

      void serializeWithType(Object value, JsonGenerator gen, SerializerProvider provider, TypeSerializer typeSer)
      Default implementation will write type prefix, call regular serialization method (since assumption is that value itself does not need JSON Array or Object start/end markers), and then write type suffix.

    • 方法详细资料

      • serialize

        public void serialize(Object value,
                      JsonGenerator gen,
                      SerializerProvider provider)
               throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: JsonSerializer
        Method that can be called to ask implementation to serialize values of type this serializer handles.
        指定者:
        serialize 在类中 StdSerializer<Object>
        参数:
        value - Value to serialize; can not be null.
        gen - Generator used to output resulting Json content
        provider - Provider that can be used to get serializers for serializing Objects value contains, if any.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • serializeWithType

        public void serializeWithType(Object value,
                              JsonGenerator gen,
                              SerializerProvider provider,
                              TypeSerializer typeSer)
                       throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: StdScalarSerializer
        Default implementation will write type prefix, call regular serialization method (since assumption is that value itself does not need JSON Array or Object start/end markers), and then write type suffix. This should work for most cases; some sub-classes may want to change this behavior.
        覆盖:
        serializeWithType 在类中 StdScalarSerializer<Object>
        参数:
        value - Value to serialize; can not be null.
        gen - Generator used to output resulting Json content
        provider - Provider that can be used to get serializers for serializing Objects value contains, if any.
        typeSer - Type serializer to use for including type information
        抛出:
        IOException
